wikitext.*:
'''Brandir''' may refer to the following:

*[[Brandir (son of Arachon)]] (born {{FA|409}}), son of [[Arachon]] and [[Bregil]], and uncle of Brandir the Lame.
*'''[[Brandir|Brandir the Lame]] ({{FA|465}} - {{FA|499|n}}), Lord of the [[House of Haleth|Haladin]] who was killed by [[Túrin|Túrin Turambar]].'''
**[[Ephel Brandir]], the settlement of Brandir the Lame upon [[Amon Obel]].
*[[Tol Brandir]], the pinnacle in the middle of the [[Anduin]] at the [[Rauros|Falls of Rauros]], lying in between [[Amon Hen]] and [[Amon Lhaw]].
